name: RCBT
description:
This is Rocket Car Boost Trial! #RCBT #neon_overplay #rocketCarBoostTrial

A Rocket League and RL Custom maps inspired fan game (a personal project I worked on while learning game development) made inside the Unity game engine.

Huge thanks to:

Game devs from Psyonix (creators behind Rocket League) and

Lethamyr (one great Rocket league content creator aka the 'best custom maps creator').

for inspiring me with their creativity and their love for what they do.

RCBT base game includes the following:
  • 1 Tutorial (or training map)
  • 2 Time-consuming Rings Maps (Neon Heights and Snow Map)
  • Octazane - an Octane inspired car

Garage - here you can provide a new paint job to your car (both primary & secondary colors, and can also load a previously saved color set).

Settings - all common game settings can be manipulated here per user choice & system requirements.

Multiple soundtracks from different artists are available (all mentioned in the credits, including 2 original tracks for RCBT made by one of my friends Poornansh Kumar).

Controls

This game supports both - Keyboard/Mouse and Controller. 

All controls can be viewed via the Controls tab in the main menu.

Updates

More updates may come in the near future!

My game dev Instagram link: https://www.instagram.com/neon_overplay/ 

(Behind the scene & work-in-progress stuff is posted on Instagram).

I hope you enjoy the game! Happy Journey!
